page.title: 13Religion in our D_block #1
page.content: The church of Scotland in our D_block is represented by{St.Ninians}in {Bellfield}and the{Parish Church}in {Shortlees.}The Church of Scotland believes that there is one God created for the Universe and that Jesus came to show people what God was really like, and the way God wanted us to live.{St.Ninians}began in{Bellfield {House in 1955.}Then they decided to build their own church which was {opened in 1959.}Both St.Ninians and Shortlees Parish are reasonably attended, with an average total congregation of around 240 although there are over 600 members in St.Ninians alone. St.Ninians and Shortlees Parish both have{communion}4 times a year. The church services are from 11am till 12 o,clock. During this time the{Sunday School}takes place and there is also a{creche}for babies.
